thread.title: Captain Fatau Dauda returns to home based Black Stars training today
thread.title_full: Captain Fatau Dauda returns to home based Black Stars training today

title: Captain Fatau Dauda returns to home based Black Stars training today
text:
19:40 CET Captain Fatau Dauda returns to home based Black Stars training today - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana goalkeeper Fatau Dauda preparing ahead of Ghanaâ€™s game against Canada 
Ghana and AshGold goalkeeper Fatau Dauda returned to the home based Black Stars training today after returning from the United States of America. 
The shot-stopper was a member of Ghana's team which played out a 1-1 draw game in Washington. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us "YOU CAN'T SEPARATE PEACE FROM FREEDOM BECAUSE NO ONE CAN BE AT PEACE UNLESS HE HAS HIS FREEDOM" By: OMANE EDWARD
